Walkthrough

Starting with your heroku app:

  • Home - Join Now

    The Home/Join Now page allows users to select their desired membership and proceed with registration

    *Note* These membership tiers will be auto populated by installing the managed package and configuring Heroku Connect

  • What Prompted You?

    Allows for the user to provide why they are interested in our membership programs.

  • Join Form

    Allows the user to enter all required data to process thier registration.

  • Payment

    The payment form is a simulation only as it is not connected to a payment gateway. Pls fill out required fields with test information and click the continue button.

  • Thank you

    Upon successful registation, the app creates a new member account, contact, and membership record to represent the sign up from the Heroku app.

  • Log In

    To simulate the ease of integrating an authenticated experience into the registration app, click on the sign in link in the header to experience the members secure dashboard.

  • Member Dashboard

    A very simple dashboard that confirms the user is authenticated and we have a trusted session to provide a differentiated experience and services to our members.

  • Salesforce: Membership Management App

    To view membership tiers in your developer org, please select the Membership Management app from the App dropdown and click on the membership tiers tab to view all tiers and related attributes.

  • Salesforce: Membership Tiers Tab

    All mobile-survey users need a contact record in Salesforce. Login to the Salesforce org and create the user’s Contact record (or edit an existing one). Be sure to fill in the “Email Address” field. This is only used to do basic authentication to provide the user access to the mobile-survey app. Also check the box labeled DD Survey Mobile User.

    *Note* You will need to add the DD Mobile Survey User field to your Contact Page Layout

  • Salesforce: Memberships Tab

    After reviewing tiers, click on the membership tab to view the membership registration record that you submitted via the web app.

TriFin Labs
Member Registration is maintained by TriFin Labs.
